text: Frank DiPascali, Jr. (October 28, 1956 - May 7, 2015) was an American financer who was the finance chief for Bernard Madoff. On August 11, 2009, he pled guilty to ten counts related to the Madoff investment scandal, a Ponzi scheme. DiPascali was born in Queens, New York. He was of Italian ancestry. He died from lung cancer, aged 58. ==References== Category:2015 deaths Category:1956 births Category:American fraudsters Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Criminals from New York City Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:People from Queens
title: Frank DiPascali
